Name: Mortlock Vanthampur
Traits: Indomitable (2/Day). Mortlock can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.
Actions: Multiattack. Mortlock makes two attacks with his greatclub. Greatclub. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage, plus 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage if Mortlock has taken any damage since his last turn. Heavy Crossbow. Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.
